languages.text:
Grants +5 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} after each attack and allows the wielder to move after attacking. If an attack with this weapon {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} 3 or more targets, this attack has no {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.
This rifle has +100% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Reload requires −1 less AP. Allows the wielder to move after shooting.

Grants +5 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} after each attack and allows the wielder to move after attacking. If an attack with this weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hits{/g} 3 or more targets, this attack has no {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.
This rifle has +100% {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}overpenetration{/g}.

This rifle has +100% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}.

Grants +5 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} after each attack and allows the wielder to move after attacking. If an attack with this weapon {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} 3 or more targets, this attack has no {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.
This rifle has +100% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}.

languages.text:
每次攻击之后都会获得5点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，装备者可以在攻击之后进行移动。如果这把步枪的攻击至少{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}3个目标，则此次攻击不会进入{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}。
这把步枪的{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}过度穿透{/g}提高100%。

traits.locale_text:
每次攻击之后都会获得5点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，装备者可以在攻击之后进行移动。如果这把步枪的攻击至少{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}3个目标，则此次攻击不会进入{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}。
这把步枪的{g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}过度穿透{/g}提高100%。

languages.text:
Дает +5 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} после каждой атаки и позволяет персонажу двигаться после стрельбы. Если {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}атака{/g} из этого оружия поражает 3 цели или более, то для этой атаки не требуется {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}период восстановления{/g}.
Выстрелы из этой винтовки получают +100% к {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}сквозному пробитию{/g}.

languages.text:
各攻撃後に{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を+5増加し、使い手が攻撃後に移動できるようにする。この武器を使った攻撃で3人以上のターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した場合、この攻撃に{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}はない。
このライフルは{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}過貫通{/g}を+100％持つ。

languages.text:
Concede +5 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} tras cada ataque y permite al usuario moverse tras atacar. Si un ataque con esta arma {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a 3 objetivos o más, este ataque no tiene {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g}.
Este rifle tiene un +100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}sobrepenetración{/g}.

languages.text:
Gewährt nach jedem Angriff +5 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und erlaubt dem Träger, sich nach dem Angriff zu bewegen. {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trifft{/g} ein Angriff mit dieser Waffe 3 oder mehr Ziele, hat der Angriff keine {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g}.
Dieses Gewehr hat +100 % {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}Überdurchdringung{/g}.

languages.text:
Confère +5 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} après chaque attaque et permet à l'utilisateur de se déplacer après celle-ci. Si une attaque portée à l'aide de cette arme {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} au moins 3 cibles, aucun {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}temps de recharge{/g} ne s'applique à cette attaque.
Ce fusil possède une {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}surpénétration{/g} de +100 %.

languages.text:
Her saldırının ardından +5 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazandırır ve kullanan kişinin saldırıdan sonra hareket edebilmesini sağlar. Bu silahla yapılan bir saldırı, 3 veya daha fazla hedefi {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurursa{/g} bu saldırı {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}dolum süresine{/g} girmez.
Bu tüfek, +%100 {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}delip geçme{/g} değerine sahiptir.
